surveyDescription: Help us understand your experience with our product

findings.message: Thank you for purchasing from us! Please take a moment to share your experience.
findings.title: Product Feedback
findings.conversion: Converted to > node with message and title

findings.question: Which product did you purchase?
findings.conversion: Converted to Ch* (required choice) with 3 options using label = value format

findings.question: Rate the overall quality
findings.conversion: Converted to Rt* (required rating) with min/max config

findings.question: Rate the value for money
findings.conversion: Converted to Rt* (required rating) with min/max config

findings.question: The product met my expectations
findings.conversion: Converted to Lk* (required likert) with scale and start/end labels config

findings.question: What features do you like most?
findings.conversion: Converted to Mc* (required multiChoice) with 5 options and maxSelections config

findings.question: Any suggestions for improvement?
findings.conversion: Converted to Tx (optional text) with placeholder config

findings.message: Thank you for your valuable feedback!
findings.title: Survey Complete
findings.conversion: Converted to < node with message and title

features: Multiple question types tested: choice, rating, likert, multiChoice, text
Mix of required and optional questions
Options with id, label, and value mappings
Configuration objects for constraints (min/max, scale, labels, maxSelections, placeholder)
Start and end nodes with messages and titles
notes: All node transitions are unconditional (single next pointer)
Question q6 is the only optional question (required: false)
Options format: id: label = value consistently applied
Likert scale uses 'scale' key in config with start/end label format
No descriptions on questions (only on survey level)
No conditional logic or branching present
